name: Tex Mex Guacamole 🥗
description: Get your taste buds ready for a flavor explosion with this Tex-Mex guacamole recipe. The addition of corn and black beans add a textural kick to the creamy avocado dip, perfect for any fiesta.
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, corn, red onion, jalapeño, black beans, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated.
